wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: isOpen
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: If true, journey planner widget will be expanded. Defaults to false.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: isWhenOpen
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: If true, journey planner widget area to define when you want to travel will be expanded. Defaults to false.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: isHowOpen
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: If true, journey planner widget area to define how (the mode of travel) do you want to travel will be expanded. Defaults to false.
